title: When Flowers Weep
description: When a beekeeper loses all his bees, a local garden shop owner vows to find an answer. But will she be able to save the bees, or is it to late? Will a lone kayaker discover clues in his research on the bayou that lead to a solution? Can the mayor protect other beekeepers from the same fate? Or, will they uncover more mysteries along the murky waters of the Moctobi Bayou?
author: Karin Boutall
